Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#483-496):

	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#493-496)

	- finalized (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#496)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#318-400):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#330-335)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#339-342)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#377)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#687-711) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#700-711)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xac577ecf648d8b30b758bd9cc0e1e91ca2aa1dab.sol#698-711)
